text: The 25th TVyNovelas Awards is an Academy of special awards to the best of soap operas and TV shows. The awards ceremony took place on May 12, 2007 in the Forum Mundo Imperial, Acapulco, Guerrero. The ceremony was televised in the Mexico by Canal de las estrellas. Lucero hosted the show. La fea más bella won 7 awards including Best Telenovela of the Year, the most for the evening. Other winners La verdad oculta and Mundo de fieras won 3 awards and Código Postal won one award. == Summary of awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin:1em auto;" ! style="background- color:#EEDD82;" | Telenovela !! style="background-color:#EEDD82;" | Nominations !! style="background-color:#EEDD82;" | Awards |- |La fea más bella ||16||7 |- |Heridas de amor ||12||0 |- |La verdad oculta ||8||3 |- |Las dos caras de Ana ||8||0 |- |Mundo de fieras ||7||3 |- |Amar sin límites ||7||0 |- |Código Postal ||2||1 |- |Duelo de Pasiones ||1||0 |} == Winners and nominees == === Novelas === César Évora, Winner for Best Antagonist Actor José José, Winner for Best Supporting Actor {| class="wikitable" |- ! **Furia Musical **Las hijas **Netas Divinas |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Best Male Star Comedy ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Best Female Star Comedy |- | valign="top" | * Arath de la Torre — La Parodia ** Adrián Uribe — La Hora Pico ** Freddy Ortega and Germán Ortega — La Parodia ** Raúl Araiza — Amor Mío ** Yordi Rosado — Otro Rollo | valign="top" | * Consuelo Duval — La Hora Pico ** Ana Bertha Espín — Vecinos ** Mayrín Villanueva — Vecinos ** Roxana Castellanos — La Parodia ** Vanessa Guzmán — Amor Mío |- |} ===Special Awards=== *Favorite Program of the Public: La fea más bella *Favorite Star of the Public: Edith González *Special Award for Mujer, casos de la vida real: Silvia Pinal *Artistic Career: Veronica Castro *Entertainment Program: Otro Rollo ===Missing=== People who did not attend ceremony wing and were nominated in the shortlist in each category: * Ana Layevska * Emilio Larrosa * Jacqueline Bracamontes * Karyme Lozano * Laura Flores * María Rubio * María Sorté * Rafael Amaya * René Strickler * Salvador Mejía * Sergio Sendel * Valentino Lanús * Vanessa Guzmán == References == Category:TVyNovelas Awards TVyNovelas Awards TVyNovelas Awards Category:TVyNovelas Awards ceremonies
